author: lightignakelloyd

text: Shigeru is the default name for Gary in Japan. In the Japanese version instead of Ash, the protagonist is called Satoshi after the creator; Satoshi Tajiri. Shigeru gets his name from Shigeru Miyamoto, the creator of the Mario and Zelda series and who is Tajiri's idol, so he name the rival character Shigeru in his honour.

author: TheRagernaut

text:
How do round electric balls have any context with a power-plant other than being electric type? Magnemite makes sense in the context that magnets are common tools in the production of energy, but voltorb is just simply a gimmick to make pokemon that can be mistaken for items on the world map. Any electric type could've replaced it's story context.

I'm not saying black/white don't have some terrible designs, but the older games are far from perfect.
author: Rottaran Owain

text: I was defending the Pokemon based on animals/ creatures. I was arguing against ridiculous ideas like Ice Cream pokemon in the new ones. And pokemon like Voltorb fit into the story in context, being found in abandoned power plants and what not. I was arguing specifically against the Ice Cream pokemon in my comment. In what context could he be possibly acceptable? Is he found in haunted Dairy Queens or Baskin Robins? The older pokemon are crazy but at least they had context.
author: TheRagernaut

text:
I personally think the vast majority of new Pokemon look incredibly stupid. Maybe it's just because I grew up with Pokemon Blue, it being my first video game and all, but I feel like they ran out of good ideas long ago. I think Blue did pretty much everything better than later generations, with the exceptions being the box system and running shoes, which of course were remedied in Leaf Green.

I'm not, of course, saying you're wrong in liking the new Pokemon. I'm just stating my opinion.
author: Sabrina P.

text:
Who can defend a ball that evolves into itself only larger, and upside-down?

Also, I think you forget that all generations have pokemon based on animals. What do you think Squirtle is? Or ponyta?

All generations have both highlights and lowlights, and in all honesty the series is better off for it. It gives contrast to our favorites whatever they may be so that we may appreciate them all the more.
author: Rottaran Owain

text: New things should be welcomed and I like some of the newer Pokemon games but c'mon... Black and White suck. The Pokemon arent even original anymore, for christ's sake there is a fuggin ICE-CREAM Pokemon. Pokemon (even look at how Satoshi came up with the idea for Pokemon) is based on adventure, etc blah blah but most of all its based on ANIMALS/ CREATURES. Magnemite and Pokemon like him are acceptable simply for their quirkiness but an ICE CREAM Pokemon? Please... who can defend that?
